contentList.content: Concussion

Your ringing head and blurry vision give you <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="Dexterity">Dexterity</LSTag> <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Ability Checks</LSTag> and reduce the range of attacks and spells to [1]. Completing a <LSTag Tooltip="ShortRest">Short Rest</LSTag> will remove a random injury and completing a <LSTag Tooltip="LongRest">Long Rest</LSTag> will remove all injuries.
Broken Bone

Your broken bone has left reduces your <LSTag Tooltip="Strength">Strength</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="Dexterity">Dexterity</LSTag> by [1]. Completing a <LSTag Tooltip="ShortRest">Short Rest</LSTag> will remove a random injury and completing a <LSTag Tooltip="LongRest">Long Rest</LSTag> will remove all injuries.
Ruptured Intestine

Your ruptured intestine reduces your <LSTag Tooltip="Constitution">Constitution</LSTag> by [1] and renders you <LSTag Tooltip="Vulnerable">Vulnerable</LSTag> to Poison damage. Completing a <LSTag Tooltip="ShortRest">Short Rest</LSTag> will remove a random injury and completing a <LSTag Tooltip="LongRest">Long Rest</LSTag> will remove all injuries.
Pierced Lung

The sharp pain experienced on every breath gives you <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="Strength">Strength</LSTag> <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Ability Checks</LSTag> and reduces your <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">Movement Speed</LSTag> by [1]. Completing a <LSTag Tooltip="ShortRest">Short Rest</LSTag> will remove a random injury and completing a <LSTag Tooltip="LongRest">Long Rest</LSTag> will remove all injuries.
Flesh Wound

The exposed layers of your flesh reduces your <LSTag Tooltip="Constitution">Constitution</LSTag> by [1] and renders you <LSTag Tooltip="Vulnerable">Vulnerable</LSTag> to Necrotic damage. Completing a <LSTag Tooltip="ShortRest">Short Rest</LSTag> will remove a random injury and completing a <LSTag Tooltip="LongRest">Long Rest</LSTag> will remove all injuries.
Severed Tendon

The severed connective tissues give you <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="Strength">Strength</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="Dexterity">Dexterity</LSTag> <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Ability Checks</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>. Completing a <LSTag Tooltip="ShortRest">Short Rest</LSTag> will remove a random injury and completing a <LSTag Tooltip="LongRest">Long Rest</LSTag> will remove all injuries.
Hypothermia

The excrutiating cold you feel reduces your <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">Movement Speed</LSTag> by [1] and renders you <LSTag Tooltip="Vulnerable">Vulnerable</LSTag> to Cold damage. Completing a <LSTag Tooltip="ShortRest">Short Rest</LSTag> will remove a random injury and completing a <LSTag Tooltip="LongRest">Long Rest</LSTag> will remove all injuries.
First Degree Burn

Previously protected layers of your flesh are exposed reducing your <LSTag Tooltip="Constitution">Constitution</LSTag> by [1]. Completing a <LSTag Tooltip="ShortRest">Short Rest</LSTag> will remove a random injury and completing a <LSTag Tooltip="LongRest">Long Rest</LSTag> will remove all injuries.
Second Degree Burn

Previously protected layers of your flesh are exposed reducing your <LSTag Tooltip="Constitution">Constitution</LSTag> by [1]. Completing a <LSTag Tooltip="ShortRest">Short Rest</LSTag> will remove a random injury and completing a <LSTag Tooltip="LongRest">Long Rest</LSTag> will remove all injuries.
Third Degree Burn

Previously protected layers of your flesh are exposed reducing your <LSTag Tooltip="Constitution">Constitution</LSTag> by [1]. Completing a <LSTag Tooltip="ShortRest">Short Rest</LSTag> will remove a random injury and completing a <LSTag Tooltip="LongRest">Long Rest</LSTag> will remove all injuries.
Nerve Damage

Pains shooting up and down your body cause you to be jittery, your ranged <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> are reduced by [1] and you have <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="SleightOfHand">Sleight of Hand</LSTag> <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Ability Checks</LSTag>. Completing a <LSTag Tooltip="ShortRest">Short Rest</LSTag> will remove a random injury and completing a <LSTag Tooltip="LongRest">Long Rest</LSTag> will remove all injuries.
Ruptured EarDrum

The sharp pain and high pitched tone in your makes you clumsy giving you <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="Stealth">Stealth</LSTag> <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Ability Checks</LSTag> and reduces your <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag> by [1]. Completing a <LSTag Tooltip="ShortRest">Short Rest</LSTag> will remove a random injury and completing a <LSTag Tooltip="LongRest">Long Rest</LSTag> will remove all injuries.
Bubbled Brow

The Acid splashed in your face hinders your vision reducing the range of attacks and spells to [1] and renders you <LSTag Tooltip="Vulnerable">Vulnerable</LSTag> to Fire damage. Completing a <LSTag Tooltip="ShortRest">Short Rest</LSTag> will remove a random injury and completing a <LSTag Tooltip="LongRest">Long Rest</LSTag> will remove all injuries.
Nausea

Your stomach is throbbing giving you <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="Constitution">Constitution</LSTag> <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag> and increasing your
Tissue Death

The patch of slimy and pale flesh on your body gives you <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="Constitution">Constitution</LSTag> <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Ability Checks</LSTag> and renders you <LSTag Tooltip="Vulnerable">Vulnerable</LSTag> to Necrotic damage. Completing a <LSTag Tooltip="ShortRest">Short Rest</LSTag> will remove a random injury and completing a <LSTag Tooltip="LongRest">Long Rest</LSTag> will remove all injuries.
Crushed Ribs

Your chest is collapsing on itself removing your ability to use <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ReactionActionPoint">Reactions</LSTag> and you have <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="Athletics">Athletics</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="Acrobatics">Acrobatics</LSTag> <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Ability Checks</LSTag>. Completing a <LSTag Tooltip="ShortRest">Short Rest</LSTag> will remove a random injury and completing a <LSTag Tooltip="LongRest">Long Rest</LSTag> will remove all injuries.
Psychic Psychosis

Your grip on reality is slipping you have <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="Wisdom">Wisdom</LSTag> <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Ability Checks</LSTag>. Completing a <LSTag Tooltip="ShortRest">Short Rest</LSTag> will remove a random injury and completing a <LSTag Tooltip="LongRest">Long Rest</LSTag> will remove all injuries.
Fried Synapses

The abundance of electrical activity in your brain leaves you with <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="Intelligence">Intelligence</LSTag> <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Ability Checks</LSTag>. Completing a <LSTag Tooltip="ShortRest">Short Rest</LSTag> will remove a random injury and completing a <LSTag Tooltip="LongRest">Long Rest</LSTag> will remove all injuries.
